headline: Kroger Celebrates Experience Makers in Honor of Supermarket Employee Day on Sunday, Feb. 22
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR), America's grocer, is celebrating Supermarket Employee Day on Feb. 22 by recognizing its more than 400,000 associates for being experience makers, bringing friendly service, fresh food and moments of joy to customers every day.

raw.headline: Kroger Celebrates Experience Makers in Honor of Supermarket Employee Day on Sunday, Feb. 22

headline: What Catalysts Are Rewriting The Ocado Group (LSE:OCDO) Narrative After Target Cuts And Kroger Shift
summary: Ocado Group's fair value estimate has been nudged from £2.71 to £2.79 per share, reflecting refreshed assumptions around revenue growth and the cost of capital that bring valuation work closer to recent analyst thinking, including JPMorgan's revised £2.90 target. This kind of fine tuning signals that expectations are being carefully recalibrated rather than torn up, with both optimistic and cautious views now more tightly anchored to updated growth and risk inputs. headline: Kroger Turns To Greg Foran To Reset Execution And Digital Grocery Plan
summary: Kroger (NYSE:KR) has appointed Greg Foran, former Walmart U.S. chief, as its new CEO. Foran is being brought in to focus on operational improvements and digital transformation. The leadership change follows the failed merger attempt with Albertsons. Kroger, one of the largest supermarket operators in the U.S., is making this leadership shift at a time when traditional grocers are contending with pressure from big box retailers, club stores, and online grocery offerings. Foran’s background...

headline: The 'boomcession': Why Americans feel left behind by a growing economy
summary: A combination of the words "boom" and "recession" can help explain why Americans feel so sour about a growing economy.

headline: As Walmart and Target head in different directions, all eyes are on their new CEOs
summary: The two big-box retailers are contending with the same economic backdrop, yet Target is trying to prove it can make a comeback.
